page.title: 14A DAY AT MALSIS SCHOOL:1
page.content: Every morning we are woken at 7.00am. After dressing,we stroll down the drive for some fresh air.This is followed by breakfast.Next we have a short time in which we prepare for morning lessons.After this we go to Prayers in our chapel,though on Saturdays we have House meetings. At 8.45 we begin 5 morning lessons which are split up after the first three by a long break.The break is lengthy as boys are required to change library books,visit the Bookshop,visit the doctor if necessary,practise musical instruments or catch up with any work which they might have to do.Otherwise we play games outside. The lessons are followed by lunch which in turn is often followed by a silent reading period at which time the school choir sometimes practises. {.................(cont. page 15)}
